title: "Course overview"

This is the homepage for CSCI 2025 - Data Manipulation and Visualization taught by Dr. Eric Friedlander in the Winter term of 2026 at the College of Idaho. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](/syllabus) and the course schedule [here](/).

## Class meetings and office hours

| Meeting      | Location                   | Time                        |
|--------------|----------------------------|-----------------------------|
| Lecture      | Cruzen-Murray Library, 208 | Mon-Thurs 1 - 3 pm          |
| Office Hours | Boone 126B                 | Mon-Thurs 10 - 11 am        |
